title: ROBOT X @METALEX
description: Outpacing and outperforming in the A.I. era will be easier at “ROBOT X,” the most comprehensive series of events on industrial robots in ASEAN. ROBOT X will transfer new powers to transform manufacturing in the hearts of emerging industrial cities, the hottest markets of the region. Buyers will experience capabilities beyond imagination from leading brands of industrial robots from around the world, complete with System Integrators, tools, and solutions from leading international brands as well as in-depth “A.I. Forum” seminar and endless opportunities. Scheduled for 18 – 21 November 2020, at BITEC, Bangkok, Thailand, together with “METALEX 2020,” No. 1 Machine Tools & Metalworking Exhibition Serving ASEAN – 34th Edition. Organizer by : Reed Tradex
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
